author: burritoman
title: Overall very good stay, excellent value.
text:
Stayed 4 nights in midweek, found the hotel to be overall very good.
Good location and fairly quiet at night with minimal traffic, hotel is undergoing some room refubishment but did not hear any noise or experience any inconvenience.
We got a refurbished room which was quite big with high ceilings and had a very nice bathroom and shower.
Room had window out to inner courtyard and because of that was very quiet at night. Our room was lacking some pictures on the walls and one or two other minor touches, also a kettle was supplied but no cups,milk,tea bags etc-strange?. Guess we could have asked for cups but didnt bother. Safe also in room.
Everywhere kept very clean with good quality towels. Bed firm but very comfortable.
Breakfast was good with enough choice to start the day.
Hotel staff friendly and check-in/ check-out painless, however there is a city tax which works out â‚¬4pp/pd.
Hotel does have a residency but only ever saw two people during our stay and they have separate exit/entrance door from hotel.
Very good stay and really excellent value at this time.
Would recommend.
